mapper.insert: insert into stock_detail_tb values (default, "입고", #{stockId}, now(), #{arrivalDate}, #{arrivalQuantity}, null, "입고예정");
mapper.select: select sdt.id, sdt.type, sdt.stock_id stockId, sdt.create_date createDate, sdt.arrival_date arrivalDate, sdt.arrival_quantity arrivalQuantity, sdt.arrived_date arrivedDate, sdt.status from stock_tb st left outer join stock_detail_tb sdt on(st.id = sdt.stock_id) where st.id = #{stock_id} and status != '입고예정' order by create_date
mapper.update: update stock_detail_tb set status = #{status}, arrived_date = now() where id = #{id}
